Document: # Rule 4: Naming Conventions In-character names must fit the server standards of: - Doesn't make obvious references, - Isn't an obvious pun or play on words, - Isn't obscene, OR - Is a result of random name generation. The only exception to the above is theatrical roles such as the clown, boxer, and mime; these roles are allowed stage names with some freedom, as long as it is not obscene. Administrators reserve the right to approve or deny character names at their discretion.
